name: Cisco | IOS | Environment | DC Voltage Out of Range #1 (SYSLOG)
description: %UBR7200-0-VOLTHIGH : [chars] measured at [chars] is too high: shutdown voltage [chars]
event_class__name: Environment | DC Voltage Out of Range

patterns.value_re: %UBR\d+00-0-VOLTHIGH\s*: .+ measured at (?P<name>\S+) is too (?P<threshold>high): shutdown voltage (?P<max>\S+)

name: Cisco | IOS | Environment | DC Voltage Out of Range #2 (SYSLOG)
description: %UBR7200-0-VOLTLOW : [chars] measured at [chars] is too low: shutdown voltage [chars]
event_class__name: Environment | DC Voltage Out of Range

patterns.value_re: %UBR\d+00-0-VOLTLOW\s*: .+ measured at (?P<name>\S+) is too (?P<threshold>low): shutdown voltage (?P<min>\S+)

name: Cisco | IOS | Environment | DC Voltage Out of Range #3 (SYSLOG)
description: Voltage 1 3300 mv has exceeded recommended operating limits.
event_class__name: Environment | DC Voltage Out of Range

patterns.value_re: (?P<name>Voltage \d+ \d+ mv) has exceeded recommended operating limits.
